languages.text: "Я вынужден так говорить. Кто еще сможет указать вам на ошибки и дать совет?"
"I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"
languages.original_text: "Я вынужден так говорить. Кто еще сможет указать вам на ошибки и дать совет?"

traits.locale_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我不得不这么做，否则还有谁能指出您的错误，为您提供建言？”
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: “我不得不这么做，否则还有谁能指出您的错误，为您提供建言？”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Estoy obligado a hablar así. ¿Quién, si no, puede indicarle sus errores y ofrecerle consejo?».
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: «Estoy obligado a hablar así. ¿Quién, si no, puede indicarle sus errores y ofrecerle consejo?».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「我はこう言わざるを得ません。他に誰があなたの誤りを指摘し、助言を与えることができるのでしょうか、と」
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: 「我はこう言わざるを得ません。他に誰があなたの誤りを指摘し、助言を与えることができるのでしょうか、と」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin verpflichtet, dies zu sagen. Wer sonst kann auf Eure Fehler hinweisen und Euch Rat bieten?"
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin verpflichtet, dies zu sagen. Wer sonst kann auf Eure Fehler hinweisen und Euch Rat bieten?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne me laissez pas le choix. Il faut bien que quelqu'un se dévoue pour vous conseiller et vous faire prendre conscience de vos erreurs. »
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne me laissez pas le choix. Il faut bien que quelqu'un se dévoue pour vous conseiller et vous faire prendre conscience de vos erreurs. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bu üslupla konuşmak mecburiyetindeyim. Aksi hâlde kim hatalarınızı belirtip size danışmanlık yapacak?"
languages.original_text: "I am obliged to speak thus. Who else can point out your errors and offer you counsel?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu üslupla konuşmak mecburiyetindeyim. Aksi hâlde kim hatalarınızı belirtip size danışmanlık yapacak?"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
